# r2dii

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of r2dii is show r2dii as a prototype for tilt.

## Installation

You can install the development version of r2dii from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2degreesinvesting/r2dii")
```

## Example

```r
r2dii::run_app()
```
